trans-unit.source: The SearchResult class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe SearchResult encapsula um nó na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services que é retornado durante uma pesquisa por <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the SearchResult class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: Instâncias da classe SearchResult são muito semelhantes às instâncias de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for SearchResult is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: A diferença fundamental é que a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe recupera as informações da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory sempre que um novo objeto é acessado, enquanto os dados para SearchResult são já disponíveis na <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>onde ele obtém retornado de uma consulta que é executada com a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection in your query will be available from SearchResult.
trans-unit.target: Somente as propriedades que são especificadas por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção em sua consulta estarão disponível na SearchResult.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> que corresponde do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use GetDirectoryEntry when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: Use GetDirectoryEntry quando você deseja examinar a entrada ao vivo, em vez da entrada que foi retornada por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, ou quando você deseja invocar um método no objeto retornado.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling GetDirectoryEntry on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar GetDirectoryEntry em cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>retornado por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>pode ser lenta.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>

trans-unit.source: The Path property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de caminho identifica exclusivamente essa entrada na hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: A entrada sempre pode ser recuperada usando este caminho.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"> </xref> coleção de propriedades para esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém apenas as propriedades que foram solicitadas explicitamente por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> of properties set on this object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"> </xref> de propriedades definida neste objeto.
